title: N8N Orders Workflow Recent Orders Not Processing
description: 4 recent orders found (including 2025-08-22T12:35:35.694Z from event 689d8a3c9e771b6de8e3bc0e) should be within 24h window but workflow execution #584 still fails with error status. API testing confirms orders exist and should be captured by 24h filter, but workflow continues to hit errors during processing preventing Notion sync.

solution.description: Applied comprehensive workflow fixes: 1) Fixed Transform Orders empty result handling to return [] instead of stopping workflow, 2) Added individual order error handling with try-catch blocks, 3) Fixed IF New Order logic to handle empty results properly, 4) Enhanced logging for debugging. All fixes deployed to N8N workflow XQ8bFr8gSIOQjWC5. Enhanced logging will provide detailed diagnostics in next execution at 21:30. Expecting 4 recent orders to sync successfully after these fixes.
